properties.displayName: Azure Policy assignment deleted or set to DoNotEnforce
properties.description: Detects deletion of Azure Policy assignments and updates that set enforcementMode to DoNotEnforce. Disabling or removing policy enforcement can open governance gaps and enable risky configurations.
properties.query:
let queryFrequency = 15m;
AzureActivity
| where ingestion_time() > ago(queryFrequency)
| where ActivityStatusValue in~ ("Succeeded","Success","Accepted")
| where tolower(OperationNameValue) has "microsoft.authorization/policyassignments/" and (tolower(OperationNameValue) endswith "/delete" or tolower(OperationNameValue) endswith "/write")
| extend IsDelete = tolower(OperationNameValue) endswith "/delete"
| extend requestBody = tostring(parse_json(Properties).requestbody)
| extend request = parse_json(requestBody)
| extend paProps = coalesce(request.properties, request.Properties)
| extend enforcementMode = tostring(coalesce(paProps.enforcementMode, paProps.EnforcementMode))
| extend IsDoNotEnforce = tolower(enforcementMode) == "donotenforce"
| where IsDelete or IsDoNotEnforce
| extend Name = tostring(split(Caller,'@',0)[0]), UPNSuffix = tostring(split(Caller,'@',1)[0])
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Caller,
    Name,
    UPNSuffix,
    CallerIpAddress,
    OperationNameValue,
    ResourceGroup,
    _ResourceId,
    Resource,
    CorrelationId,
    SubscriptionId,
    IsDelete,
    enforcementMode
